title: Serving spoon
provenance_text:
Eleanor Evans [1799-1887], 1832 [1]. Caroline L. DuPuy [1868-1924]; by descent to Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, April 27, 1924; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Eleanor Evans, also known by her married name as Eleanor Reynolds, married Reverend John Reynolds in 1832. This item was a wedding gift. Herbert DuPuy was related to Eleanor Evans, who the mother of Mrs. Charles Meredith Dupuy.However, it is not clear if this item descended to Herbert directly from Eleanor.
